citations.narrative:
The inside sections of the sheltered facility, affecting 2 dogs and 1 puppy, has an accumulation of dried mud on the walls
and floors. This accumulation can become a disease hazard. The licensee must clean the inside sections of the
enclosures. Hard surfaces with which the animals come into contact with must be spot cleaned daily and sanitized at least
once every 2 weeks to reduce disease hazards.
To be corrected by: 13 Jun 23

There was an unopened bag of dog food stored directly on the floor of a shed. There was also an open bag of poultry
food stored next to it. Food must be stored off of the floor and away from the walls to allow for cleaning underneath and
around the supplies. Open bags of food must be stored in a container with a tightly fitting lid to reduce the likelihood of
rodents.
The licensee must ensure that all food is stored up off the floor and away from walls to allow for cleaning at all times.
Open bags of food must be stored in a container with a tightly fitting lid at all times.
To be corrected by: 23 Jun 23
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

The inside sections of the sheltered facility, affecting 2 dogs and 1 puppy, has an accumulation of dried mud on the walls

3.1(e) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
There was an unopened bag of dog food stored directly on the floor of a shed. There was also an open bag of poultry 
food stored next to it. Food must be stored off of the floor and away from the walls to allow for cleaning underneath and 
around the supplies. Open bags of food must be stored in a container with a tightly fitting lid to reduce the likelihood of 
rodents.  
The licensee must ensure that all food is stored up off the floor and away from walls to allow for cleaning at all times. 
Open bags of food must be stored in a container with a tightly fitting lid at all times.

This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
